tool.name: PTXQC
tool.command: mkdir inputs && ln -s '$mqpar' inputs/mqpar.xml && #if $parameters ln -s '$parameters' inputs/parameters.txt && #end if #if $summary ln -s '$summary' inputs/summary.txt && #end if #if $proteinGroups ln -s '$proteinGroups' inputs/proteinGroups.txt && #end if #if $evidence ln -s '$evidence' inputs/evidence.txt && #end if #if $msms ln -s '$msms' inputs/msms.txt && #end if #if $msmsScans ln -s '$msmsScans' inputs/msmsScans.txt && #end if Rscript '$qr' '$qr_yaml'
